translation.en: Ma Anand Sheela, famous for being Bhagwan Rajneesh's top aid,
translation.es: Ma Anand Sheela, la famosa ayudante de Bhagwan Rajneesh,

translation.en: is facing serious charges of both fraud and attempted murder.
translation.es: enfrenta cargos por fraude e intento de asesinato.

translation.en: Ma Anand Sheela and ten to 15 top Rajneeshi leaders
translation.es: Ma Anand Sheela y otros altos líderes rajneeshi

translation.en: have been fired by Bhagwan and kicked off the central Oregon ranch.
translation.es: fueron expulsados por Bhagwan del rancho de Oregón.

translation.en: Ma Sheela will no longer be received
at any Rajneeshi commune anywhere in the world.
translation.es: en ninguna comuna rajneeshi del mundo.

translation.en: She is the murderer.
No one imagined that we'd find ourselves neck- deep in what was simultaneously
translation.es: Nadie imaginó que nos encontraríamos hundidos en lo que era simultáneamente

translation.en: the largest case of immigration fraud,
translation.es: el mayor caso de fraude migratorio,

translation.en: the largest case of poisoning and the largest case of wiretapping!
translation.es: de envenenamiento y de espionaje telefónico.

translation.en: She has betrayed the whole commune.
translation.es: Ha traicionado a toda la comuna.

translation.en: Hello, Sheela.
Hi, Anurag.
I called you to give you a very, very good news.
translation.es: Te llamo para darte una muy buena noticia.

translation.en: We are now confirming your India trip and you should start packing now.
translation.es: Confirmamos tu viaje a la India, empieza a empacar.

translation.en: - - Don't know what to say, Anurag.
I'm so happy. You know, everyone was scaring me, telling me,
translation.es: Estoy muy feliz. Todos me asustaban, me decían:

translation.en: Oh! What if Sheela doesn't get visa? What if she's banned in India?
translation.es: ¿Y si Sheela no obtiene la visa? ¿Y si la rechazan en la India?.

translation.en: And what about security?
I have organized, you've nothing to worry about security.
translation.es: Ya organicé todo, no te preocupes por la seguridad.

translation.en: All the clearances have been done.
There's so many people who are looking forward to meet you.
- - And you know, when we started talking, it was just one event,
translation.es: Cuando comenzamos a hablar de esto, era un solo evento,

translation.en: but now this is becoming like a whole tour.
translation.es: pero ahora se ha convertido en una gira.

translation.en: I don't know how to thank you, Anurag.
So, finally you're coming to India after 30 years.
translation.es: Finalmente, tras 30 años, volverás a la India.

translation.en: No. I will be coming after… 35 years almost.
Oh, wow.
Happy homecoming, Sheela.
The world had almost forgotten about Sheela  till a 2018 Netflix documentary
translation.es: El mundo había olvidado a Sheela, pero un documental de Netflix de 2018,

translation.en: that followed the rise and fall of Rajneeshpuram,
translation.es: que siguió el surgimiento y la caída de Rajneeshpuram,

translation.en: brought the Vadodara born anti- hero back into the limelight.
translation.es: hizo que los reflectores volvieran a la antiheroína nacida en Vadodara.

translation.en: - - The lady who was supposed to be
translation.es: La mujer que supuestamente era la más cercana

translation.en: the closest to Bhagwan Rajneesh, better known as Osho,
translation.es: La mujer que supuestamente era la más cercana a Bhagwan Rajneesh, mejor conocido como Osho,

translation.en: someone who came to be seen as a shrewd mind,
translation.es: alguien que llegó a ser considerada una mente astuta,

translation.en: who spoke her mind.
Almost controlled Osho
and also controlled his empire.
When we first moved in this house,
translation.es: Cuando me acababa de mudar a esta casa,

translation.en: people in the village,
translation.es: las fantasías de la gente local

translation.en: their fantasies started playing big.
They would gossip and talk,
they all walk in the night in white robes like ghosts.
translation.es: Todos caminan de noche, con batas blancas, como fantasmas.

translation.en: A strange music comes out of there.
translation.es: De ahí sale una música extraña.

translation.en: A young girl from Gujarat,
- who made it very, very big. -
Anti- hero for some, a villain for others
translation.es: Una antiheroína para algunos, una villana para otros,

translation.en: whose antics caused a stir wherever she went.
Some people wear their baggage
on their face.
I wear that baggage on my shoulders.
translation.es: Yo llevo esa carga en los hombros.

translation.en: An epitome of feminism
or a woman who tried to poison an entire town?
translation.es: una mujer que trató de envenenar a un pueblo entero?

translation.en: The brain behind Osho's empire or a criminal master mind?
translation.es: ¿El cerebro detrás del imperio de Osho o una mente criminal maestra?

translation.en: Who is the real Sheela?
World sees me from their point of view.
translation.es: El mundo me ve desde su punto de vista.

translation.en: And the world only loves to see problems,
translation.es: Y al mundo solo le gusta ver problemas,

translation.en: so, they misunderstand.
There's so much more.
I'm not the same person you think I am.
translation.es: No soy la persona que creen.

translation.en: Life is a good performance.
translation.es: La vida es una buena actuación.

translation.en: What role do you like then?
Snow White or the Wicked Witch?
Both.
It is eight days
after my imprisonment.
translation.es: desde que había salido de la cárcel.

translation.en: I was out of prison.
My mom and dad flew from India to visit me.
translation.es: Mi papá y mi mamá volaron desde la India para visitarme.

translation.en: And I didn't want them to feel stress
translation.es: Y no quería que sintieran el estrés

translation.en: of the prison on my being.
translation.es: de la prisión en mi ser.

translation.en: The picture of freedom.
Freedom from
how world views me
translation.es: de la forma en la que el mundo me veía

translation.en: and how it feels to be
translation.es: y lo que se siente estar

translation.en: surrounded by parents' love.
♪ Hallelujah! ♪
And I've been taking care of disabled people
translation.es: He estado cuidando a personas discapacitadas,

translation.en: from different complex illnesses.
Let me take those. Okay?
I do have
a lot of unwanted baggage on my shoulder.
translation.es: un gran peso no deseado sobre mis hombros.

translation.en: If I didn't have it,
it would make my work much easier.
translation.es: mi trabajo sería mucho más fácil.

translation.en: At such times, I miss the times I spent…
translation.es: En días así, extraño el tiempo…

translation.en: with our mom.
It's 40 years.
One thing and one thing only.
Why are you still harping on the old thing
translation.es: ¿Por qué sigues insistiendo en lo de antes,

translation.en: which has no meaning anymore?
I wouldn't be afraid of expressing myself to them.
translation.es: No me daría miedo expresarme con ellos.

translation.en: But they will start writing bad stories on you then.
translation.es: Pero entonces comenzarán a escribir malos artículos sobre ti.

translation.en: - - Who cares, Sheeli?
Who cares?
- They want to earn their living… - If you're not afraid.
translation.es: - Quieren ganarse la vida… - Si no te da miedo.

translation.en: …and Sheeli has to pay the cost.
translation.es: …y Sheeli tiene que pagar ese precio.

translation.en: - - People who know me
don't misunderstand me.
My father felt
I must speak about it.
That's when I decided to write the book,
translation.es: Por eso decidí escribir el libro

translation.en: Don't Kill Him.
My father says
in spite of problems, you must move forward.
translation.es: que, a pesar de los problemas, hay que avanzar.

translation.en: I was always afraid that
once she goes to India then she might not come back alive.
translation.es: de que, cuando se fuera a la India, quizá no volviera viva.

translation.en: And now… um, we are at the end of the line,
translation.es: Ahora que estamos cerca del final,

translation.en: then she should go and visit irrespective of what may happen.
translation.es: debería ir de visita y que pase lo que tenga que pasar.

translation.en: People have to move on.
Somebody has to take responsibility
to erase the misunderstandings
that media has created over years.
translation.es: que los medios crearon durante años.

translation.en: Existence offers me the opportunity.
translation.es: La existencia me ofrece la oportunidad.

translation.en: I will take the challenge.
Bhagwan Sri Rajneesh.
It started quietly enough when he took over a secluded ranch
translation.es: Empezó discretamente cuando se asentó en un rancho

translation.en: where he preached his particular brand of eastern mysticism
translation.es: donde predicaba su mezcla de misticismo oriental

translation.en: and western pop psychology.
Of course, what shone a spotlight on him was the famous sexual meditation groups.
translation.es: Claro, lo que lo volvió famoso fue su meditación sexual.

translation.en: And when Rajneeshis took over the nearby town of Antelope,
translation.es: Cuando los rajneeshis se apoderaron de la ciudad aledaña de Antelope,

translation.en: that's when things really started to change.
Rajneeshi is a new phenomenon,
never before in the world
translation.es: nunca antes visto en el mundo.

translation.en: intellectuals have gathered together
and created an Oasis in the desert.
translation.es: para crear un oasis en el desierto.

translation.en: Whatever this kingdom was about self- enlightenment or free love.
translation.es: Este reino se trataba de iluminación y amor libre.

translation.en: It was about money, heaps of it.
Some 200 million dollars from 30,000 Rajneeshis around the world.
translation.es: Son alrededor de 200 millones de dólares de 30 000 rajneeshis alrededor del mundo.

translation.en: As for the Bhagwan, he watches in silence
translation.es: Respecto al Bhagwan, él observa en silencio,

translation.en: often from the front seat of a Rolls- Royce
as Rajneeshpuram grows in size and wealth.
translation.es: cómo el tamaño y las riquezas de Rajneeshpuram crecen.

translation.en: I am the rich man's guru.
translation.es: Soy el gurú del hombre rico.

translation.en: It is said that after Bhagwan himself, Ma Anand Sheela
translation.es: Se dice que, tras el propio Bhagwan, Ma Anand Sheela

translation.en: is the most consequential person in the Rajneesh Empire.
translation.es: es la persona más importante en el imperio rajneesh.

translation.en: President of the Rajneesh foundation
and the only person with direct access to the man himself.
translation.es: y la única persona que tiene acceso directo al hombre mismo.

translation.en: Some speculate that Bhagwan Sri Rajneesh is no longer the leader.
translation.es: Algunos especulan que Bhagwan Sri Rajneesh ya no es el líder

translation.es: y que es la propia Sheela

translation.en: who commands the 350 thousand disciples.
translation.es: la que dirige a los 350 000 discípulos.

translation.en: He and I made a great team together.
translation.es: Él y yo hacíamos un gran equipo juntos.

translation.en: It was a shame that it had to break up.
translation.es: Fue una pena que tuviera que romperse.

translation.en: She did not even come to say goodbye to me.
People who don't commit crime don't escape like that.
translation.es: La gente que no comete crímenes no escapa de esa forma.

translation.en: Out of the very burden of all the crimes that she has done,
translation.es: La carga de todos los crímenes que ella ha cometido

translation.en: she will suffer her whole life.
translation.es: la hará sufrir toda su vida.

translation.en: - I'm just bewildered, you know? -
Maybe you've been waiting for this for almost a month now…
translation.es: Quizá lleva un mes esperando este momento.

translation.en: More than a month.
Right now, he is possibly the most carefully watched man in the state.
translation.es: En este momento es posiblemente el hombre más vigilado del estado.

translation.en: You're damn right.
He is the most precious man in the world.
translation.es: Es el hombre más valioso del mundo.

And the show is irreverent and fun and it's meant to be mildly scandalous.

I'm going to get down and dirty.
No problem.

I have lived a transparent life.
- Thanks to cameras. - Yeah,

It's unfortunate that after everything that actually transpired and happened,

And did you feel that for yourself that it was the end of an era?

translation.es: Me fui porque tuve un problema personal con Bhagwan.

Your journey began as a result of love.
translation.es: Tu viaje comenzó como resultado del amor.

When you talk about this story, Sheela,
translation.es: Cuando hablas de esta historia, Sheela,

- No. - No.

Okay, so I got the opportunity of speaking to one of the most talked about person

They're still talking about her. You know her by the name Ma Anand Sheela.

I think you're more or just as popular as Game of Thrones now.

you're the new pop culture, man. You are.

in perception about you?
Well, timeline of perception is not so reliable.

What the situation is and how it moves

- - I know what I did.

What people write,
talk about, whatever nonsense…
I pleaded not guilty

There is absolutely no love lost between the disciples of Bhagwan Rajneesh
translation.es: No hay una tregua entre los discípulos de Bhagwan Rajneesh

translation.es: y los residentes de Antelope, Oregón.

has been in court defending its right to exist

I'm going to give it right back

- - And…

Is that age? Or has Sheela changed?

It is a mystery.

translation.es: Sheela siempre fue cortés y amorosa

How did you cope with that time?

If he would have been there any longer, probably he would have died.

Cardamom tea.

Life is multi- dimension.

Where did you get that strength?

- That's good. - That's good.
Yeah.
Ah, okay, here it is. Right, Savita aunty
translation.es: Claro, ahí está. Sí, la tía Savita

translation.en: would sit here.
- Uncle would sit ahead. - Right.
translation.es: - El tío se sentaba adelante. - Sí.

translation.en: - They took away the garden. - Oh yeah, they took away.
translation.es: - Pero quitaron el jardín. - Sí, lo quitaron.

translation.en: Do you have something to eat now?
This is amazing.
Sheela, we recognized you as Mr. Ambalal's daughter.
translation.es: Sheela, te reconocemos como hija del señor Ambalal.

translation.en: You're right.
- I surely am Ambalal's daughter. - He was as powerful as you.
translation.es: - Soy hija de Ambalal. - Era tan poderoso como tú.

translation.en: After all these years, how come you're here? Did you miss your house?
translation.es: Después de tantos años, ¿por qué estás aquí? ¿Extrañas tu casa?

translation.en: I missed the house. I am nearing the end of my life…
translation.es: Extrañaba la casa. Me acerco al final de mi vida.

translation.en: - You must stay back. - I am nearing the end of my life…
translation.es: - Más atrás. - Me acerco al final.

translation.en: No, why do you say that?
Your dad and mother passed away, and now you are talking about this…
translation.es: Tu papá y tu mamá fallecieron, y ahora hablas de esto.

translation.en: That was our house,
yellow.
And I was born in this room.
translation.es: Y yo nací en este cuarto.

translation.en: This was mine and Maya's room.
Unreal.
What all happens in 70 years.
translation.es: Todo lo que ha pasado en 70 años.

translation.en: How are you? I'm good.
- Is everything all right? - I'm doing well.
Ahh, he made laddus.
Wow!
Your father liked laddus too, right?
Indeed, he did.
My father's pillows.
Father's pillows.
He used to sit here all day
translation.es: Se sentaba aquí todo el día,

translation.en: - on the swing. - He'd sit all day.
translation.es: - en el columpio. - Todo el día.

translation.en: Wonderful.
My father would sit on this
and wait
for the post to bring
translation.es: a que el correo le trajera

translation.en: letters from the prison
and he would read it to everybody.
translation.es: y se las leía a todos.

translation.en: India has just flooded the emotions.
translation.es: La India me inunda de emociones.

translation.en: It is like
a dam has been broken.
All this while, what were you thinking?
You thought that you had locked away something?
No, not locked away.
I thought I had worked out these emotions.
translation.es: Creí que había superado estas emociones.

translation.en: Yeah.
I was thrown into an open sea.
I had number of hardships after I left Bhagwan.
translation.es: Tuve muchas dificultades después de dejar a Bhagwan.

translation.en: During this time,
I had to
go within myself
and find, analyze…
did I offer it to gain something?
Or was it the offering?
Where are we going?
The Burning Ghat,
where Osho was cremated.
And It was from all corners clear.
It wasn't even an offering.
It was the nature of love.
- It's the new bridge they built? - Yes.
- Haji Ali will be on this side? - Yeah.
translation.es: - Y el Haji Ali estará de este lado. - Sí…

translation.en: You remember these roads after all these years?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas estas calles después de tantos años?

translation.en: When I see Haji Ali,
then I say, Oh, now only few more minutes and I'll be
translation.es: decía: Solo unos minutos más y estaré

translation.en: in the Woodland area.
That's when I met him
and that meeting…
was what
this whole…
storm has created
in my life, in Bhagwan's life, in sanyasins' life.
translation.es: en mi vida, en la vida de Bhagwan, en la vida de los sanyasins.

translation.en: I think it was that…
apartment and I can see Bhagwan's room from here also.
translation.es: ese departamento y puedo ver la habitación de Bhagwan desde aquí.

translation.en: Number 8?
It is
over 40 years.
I was here with my father.
translation.es: desde que estuve aquí con mi padre.

translation.en: When did you become a follower of Bhagwan?
translation.es: ¿Cuándo te convertiste en seguidora de Bhagwan?

translation.en: When I was 21.
Please can we come in?
No, madam is not home.
- Alright. - She's gone out.
This was Bhagwan's living room.
translation.es: Esta era la sala de Bhagwan.

translation.en: She used to live in this house many years ago.
translation.es: Ella solía vivir en esta casa hace muchos años.

translation.en: That's fine.
You will need to talk to madam. I cannot let you in.
translation.es: Tienen que hablar con la señora, no las puedo dejar pasar.

translation.en: What to do? Life is like that.
Life has day and night.
translation.es: La vida tiene día y noche.

translation.en: Life has life and death.
translation.es: La vida tiene vida y muerte.

translation.en: And what is so beautiful?
A woman who has experienced a man dying right near her.
translation.es: Una mujer que ha experimentado la muerte cercana de su esposo.

translation.en: Right in my lap, my husband died.
translation.es: Mi esposo murió en mis brazos.

translation.en: If it wasn't for Bhagwan's wisdom,
translation.es: Si no fuera por la sabiduría de Bhagwan,

translation.en: today I could have been a neurotic woman.
translation.es: hoy podría ser una mujer neurótica.

translation.en: I was able to take that death as acceptance.
translation.es: Pude llevar esa muerte con aceptación.

translation.en: When you love somebody unconditionally,
it is automatic that you offer.
But every queen goes through guillotine
translation.es: Pero cada reina pasa por una guillotina

translation.en: and I have been through guillotine
translation.es: y yo he estado en una guillotina.

translation.en: and I wish we can move on.
They have to stop asking why
translation.es: Tienen que dejar de preguntarme por qué

translation.en: or how or what.
Put yourself in my shoes
and look within.
How will you feel?
There is so much more.
But there's also a reality in history
translation.es: Pero también hay una realidad en la historia.

translation.en: that people who lose…
See you, guys.
Yes, bye.
…they are not recorded either.
But history is not written
translation.es: Pero la historia no está escrita

translation.en: for my part.
History is of Bhagwan.
It is Bhagwan's history, not Sheela's history.
translation.es: Es la historia de Bhagwan, no de Sheela.

translation.en: But later you told me that you want to speak to your mother.
translation.es: Pero después me dijiste que querías hablar con tu madre.

translation.en: But mother died long ago.
Of course, look at me,
- look at me. - No, she is not dead.
Yes, your mother is dead, your dad is no more,
translation.es: Sí, tu mamá murió, tu papá murió.

translation.en: just like mine.
- Yours are dead. - Yes, mine are also dead.
translation.es: - Tus padres murieron. - Los míos murieron también.

translation.en: - They’re still alive. - No…
Then I should do what Christina does…
translation.es: Debería hacer lo que hace Christina.

translation.en: No, they are not alive anymore.
translation.es: No, ellos ya no están vivos.

translation.en: They are alive.
- In your heart. - No… That is so stupid.
translation.es: - En tu corazón. - No, eso es tonto.

translation.en: Okay.
And this is the bed father died in.
translation.es: Y esta es la cama en la que murió mi padre.

translation.en: As one grows old,
one has to be aware of the life
translation.es: debe estar consciente de la vida

translation.en: one has lived. And then comes death.
translation.es: que ha vivido. Luego llega la muerte.

translation.en: And one has to be prepared to go.
translation.es: Y uno debe estar preparado para irse.

translation.en: - To go? - To go.
Also that, but we do not know at all
translation.es: También eso, pero no sabemos nada

translation.en: what happens afterwards
because we cannot look into the future.
translation.es: porque no podemos ver el futuro.

translation.en: Cannot look at all.
One has to come back to this moment.
translation.es: Uno tiene que regresar a este momento.

translation.en: And at this moment,
what can I do
for my future death?
How can I make this dying easier?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puedo hacer que morir sea más fácil?

translation.en: - Tony? - Yes.
The salad.
- Salad was good? - Very good.
So shall we cancel the meal?
People ask the same questions.
translation.es: La gente hace las mismas preguntas.

translation.en: Redemption!
They don't want to move on.
Let's say all of these put together
is public truth.
Sheela, the terrible,
Sheela, the charmer. To see one is to believe the other doesn't exist.
translation.es: Sheela, la encantadora. Ver a una es creer que la otra no existe.

translation.en: Not my reality,
public truth.
Without knowing my reality,
without feeling my reality,
they have condemned me.
They want me to redeem myself, then they can say,
translation.es: Quieren que yo me redima para poder decir:

translation.en: Oh we redeem ourselves also.
What will you redeem?
You will redeem love.
I went in a prison,
I sat there 39 months,
now it's enough.
How will you redeem yourself?
My past is lived by me,
translation.es: Mi pasado es vivido por mí.

translation.en: I have to own it.
Redemption
lies in guilt.
That's why I cannot redeem myself.
